casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Curtis LOWERY, Jr. 330P13-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Tammy A. Bouchelle, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. William Curtis Lowery, Jr., for Lowery, William Curtis The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of April 2017 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017." Ervin, J. recused
